Some Personal Projects

Games

  • H.P. Lovecraft Teaches Typing

    An HTML5 typing game. Made with the Phaser game engine.

  • Badges of Honor

    A satire of the modern first-person shooter.

  • Glorious Defender

    Pong/Missile Defender hybrid written with HaxeFlixel.

  • Glorious Golfer

    Classic golf video game written with HaxeFlixel.

    "...may be the most ridiculous game ever made." - The Daily Mirror

  • DMZ Dash

    Infinite runner game written with HaxeFlixel.

  • Stress Away!

    Experimental stress-reduction game which explores whether simulated violence can provide inner peace. Contains poorly simulated choking.

  • Shingy Bird

    An HTML5 "flappy bird" clone starring AOL's Digital Prophet, Shingy. Made with the Phaser game engine.

Web apps

  • Oldstagramme

    "Take pictures which take time to take." BuzzFeed write-up

  • Internet Peso

    "Digital currency for humans." A joke cybercurrency. Written in Django but has classy .aspx URLs.

Twitter

  • gif hell

    New and trending gifs on twitter. Article on TheVerge.com

  • lol/s

    A twitter bot which counts the occurence of "lol" in tweets, emits graphs, and additionally shows the tweets which are most replied to with lol. Here's a gevent-based framework I made for these sorts of things.

BuzzFeed upgrades

  • ButtFeet

    BuzzFeed but with slightly different text and images. Uses Varnish, uWSGI, and BeautifulSoup.

  • BzzzFeee

    Turns entire BuzzFeed articles into easy-to-consume .gifs.

Hubot

  • hubot-drudgesiren

    Hubot script which alerts a room when siren.gif appears on drudgereport.com.

  • hubot-rapture

    Hubot script which can report the current rapture index.

Tutorial

  • How To Make Animated Human Sprites

    A description of an open-source animated humanoid sprite pipeline.

Questionable projects

  • Huge Wall of Porn

    NSFW. Huge sector-based, live-updating wall of porn and text-chat. Uses D3, Django, gevent, redis.
